column1: gorthob is a Sindarin word meaning "horrible".
column2: p. 415 (Authors note 28) It has been suggested that the form should be gortheb (applying standard adjectival ending).http://www.jrrvf.com/hisweloke/sindar/online/sindar/dict-sd-en-strict.html Hiswelókës Sindarin Dictionary (accessed 28 December 2010)

column1: In the The Etymologies appears the Doriathrin form ngorthin ("horrible").
